newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE sugar slow, mixed pre-holiday.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE sugar slow, mixed pre-holiday.

text.p: LIFFE sugar was mixed in quiet trade, ahead of a long holiday weekend.
By 1530 GMT August was 10 cents lower at $320.20. August dominated trade, with 151 of a total 295 lots done so far.
"It's the end of the week in which the New York dinner was held, we've got a holiday on Monday, I can't see a lot happening to be quite honest," one trader said.
The dinner he referred to was this week's U.S. Cane Sugar Refiners' Association dinner in New York.
Another reckoned the market was sitting back and relaxing after producing solid turnover Thursday. "Holiday feelings prevail," he said.
